title: Gene-Poor Disease Supplementation via External Databases

ctd_coverage.note: Inferred genes are 60-85% non-specific (most drugs overlap)

specificity_analysis.note: CTD inferred genes are orders of magnitude less specific than DRKG curated genes

root_cause: 24/41 zero-gene diseases are infectious (pathogen-based etiology, not human genetic). Gene-disease associations are fundamentally inappropriate for mechanism checking in infectious diseases.

antimicrobial_spectrum_match_preview.note: These spectrum-matched predictions are likely high quality (antifungals for fungal infections, etc.)
